item.title: So You Want To Write A Digital Strategy? - Smashing Magazine
item.description:
So You Want To Write A Digital Strategy? - Smashing Magazine

"Can you put together a digital strategy for us to review?" Requests like this strike fear into those of us who work on the Web. What do we know about putting together strategy documents? Yes, we understand the Web, but we don't know how to write a document that is essentially a business strategy.
